document_data.name: ''Yeti-Bone Hammer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Yeti-bone hammer''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[maul]] that belonged to [[Raika]] a [[Reghedmen]] [[barbarian]] adventurer active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: This oversized bludgeon was affixed to a strong [[yeti]] bone and reinforced with metal bounds.
document_data.Powers: This enchanted hammer had a coin-toss chance of landing an ''avalanche of blows'' on a group of targets after landing a successful pummel on a single opponent.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Raika]]: a [[half-orc]] [[barbarian]] who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
